text: Paleolibertarianism is a political ideology designed by Murray Rothbard and Llewelyn Rockwell that brings together paleoconservatism and libertarianism. It has since evolved into a large political movement within the Libertarian Party that has become the basis for the Mises Caucus. Rothbard used paleolibertarianism to justify supporting the David Duke when he ran for Governor of Louisiana in the 1991 Louisiana gubernatorial election. == References == Category:Libertarianism
title: Paleolibertarianism
